column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " So , you think Mr. Sato manufactured those gloves for the Equalists then framed Cabbage Corp ? "
#Text=Lin says : " That 's a bold accusation , but what proof do you have ? "
#Text=Korra says : " Well , I do n't exactly have proof , but I know what I heard .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Twelve years ago , the Agni Kai Triad robbed Sato 's mansion .
#Text=A firebender killed Sato 's wife during the break in .
#Text=It 's possible that he 's been harboring anti-bending sentiment all this time .
#Text=" Lin says : " Maybe we should look at Mr. Sato a little more closely .
